SENT.plain: Clonal abnormalities of the long arm of chromosome 13 were detected in 9 of 54 patients with Burkitt lymphoma-leukemia
All abnormalities involved band 13q34, in three patients as t(1;13)
The 13q34 abnormalities are thus the second most frequent secondary chromosomal abnormalities, after those of chromosome I, in these lymphoid proliferations
